/work/doc/pages/Session.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 \defgroup fixp-protocol-session FIXP Session
2 \ingroup getting-started
3 
4 \details
5 
6 An FIXP session is defined as a bi-directional stream of ordered messages between two parties
7 within a continuous sequence number series. It is represented by the OnixS::B3::BOE::Session class.
8 Each FIXP session is identified by a \ref session-version-identification.
9 
10 \section constructing-session Constructing FIX Session
11 
12 To create a FIXP session, use OnixS::B3::BOE::Session class with the correspondent constructors:
13 
14 \section constructing-session-example Example
15
